fishy.success_plural: You caught a {{caughtType}} for {{username}} worth {{count}} fishies! ({{oldAmount}} → {{newAmount}} total fishies)

Discord REST API (message send): `{{restMs}}ms`
sushii API: `{{sushiiApiMs}}ms`

error.name_already_exists: A role menu `{{name}}` already exists! Please pick a different name.

error.missing_content_and_attachment: You must provide either a content or an attachment to add a tag!

success.message_content: Here are all {{count}} tags in this server!

error.title: Tag search failed
error.no_options: You must provide at least one search option.
error.starts_with_contains_xor: You can only use *one* of the options `name starts with` or `name contains`, not both.

error.title: Random tag failed
error.starts_with_contains_xor: You can only use *one* of the options `name starts with` or `name contains`, not both.

error.title: Tag edit failed
error.not_owner: You do not own the tag {{tagName}} so you cannot edit it :(
error.no_options: You must provide at least one option `content` or `attachment`.

error.already_exists: Tag {{tagName}} already exists, please choose another name.

error.not_owner: You do not own the tag {{tagName}} so you cannot delete it :(

error.invalid_duration: Invalid duration! Please provide a duration like `1 hour` or `3 days 1 hour`.

success.title: Your reminders
success.empty: You have no reminders! You must have good memory.

error.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command, sorry! You need the {{permission}} permission.
error.internal: Uh oh! Something went wrong, maybe you can try again?
